Meta

2017 Gaming Resolutions

03 Jan 2017, 20:03
Meta

I’m constantly accumulating things that I want to do in gaming, but I almost never actually accomplish them. Sure, I get some things done, but usually it’s the low-hanging fruit, and I feel like I need a place to write them down, and actually make some progress on them. So, here, in no particular order is the stuff I want to do in 2017: Start a gaming blog I’ve been planning on launching a gaming blog for a few years now, and I haven’t managed to actually get it off the ground.
